item.title: Why is this server "help"even made
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:7, topic:360290”]Most questions are asked in a horrible form. If you want your question answered, you need to:

[ul][li]Post source code. Saying your command won’t work and expecting us to know your code automatically is foolish.[/li]
[li]Use correct spelling and grammar.[/li]
[li]Try and understand what is wrong with the problem. Compiling errors state what is wrong, but people fail to read and do not follow any help.[/li][/ul][/quote]

[ul][li]Provide the source/revision you are using.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Why is this server "help"even made
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Most questions are asked in a horrible form. If you want your question answered, you need to:

[ul][li]Post source code. Saying your command won’t work and expecting us to know your code automatically is foolish.[/li]
[li]Use correct spelling and grammar.[/li]
[li]Try and understand what is wrong with the problem. Compiling errors state what is wrong, but people fail to read and do not follow any help.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Why is this server "help"even made
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

The reason why I don’t help 99% of the time is because it’s the same bullshit every time, compiler errors, can’t even run their server, can’t port forward, can’t turn their computer on?!?! What’s next they need help opening notepad?? More like we do it all for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Why is this server "help"even made
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Well I think we have it for people who actually can explain their problem to us in correct grammar, or at least partially correct grammar. I also think, like Scape-Java said, that it drives people away when they see multiple topics by the same person on the page. Also to add on to that it annoys us when people make topics like: “heeellllppppppp pl0xxx!!!11”, so maybe if people wouldn’t act like that this part would be more productive.
Also this isn’t a help thread.
/thread

Read full topic

item.title: Why is this server "help"even made
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You don’t need multiple topics, that just drives people away from your help topic. It’s really annoying, seeing multiple topics in the help section from the same person, just until somebody posts on your topic.

Read full topic
